author: Brian Turner
method: To make the drop scones, place all the ingredients together in a bowl.  Mix until well combined, to create a thick batter. Heat the vegetable oil in a medium non-stick frying pan on a medium heat. Ladle the mixture into the pan in small dollops.  Cook for 1-2 minutes and turn over.  Cook until golden brown. To make the caramelised bananas, in a medium sized frying pan on a medium heat melt the butter. Add the sugar and cook for two minutes until golden. Add the cream and banana and cook for one more minute. Serve the drop scones with the caramelised bananas on top.
